AnalyticsSection.subtitle: WHY YOU CAN RELY ON US
AnalyticsSection.title: Why choose Enterprise Analytics?
AnalyticsSection.paragraph1: Enterprise Analytics Software GmbH develops, adapts and operates AI-powered analysis, monitoring and management software solutions for companies that develop and manufacture complex products.
AnalyticsSection.paragraph2: The EAS Cockpit® software scans all relevant systems and databases of your company comprehensively.
AnalyticsSection.paragraph3: The solution focuses exclusively on the product, its assemblies and individual parts. For each component, all key figures and decision-relevant information are analyzed, evaluated and aggregated in the EAS Cockpit. Starting with the individual part, aggregation can be performed across components, assemblies, sets, departments, overall product/project, market segment and even the entire company.
AnalyticsSection.paragraph4: The software actively uses tailor-made, virtual, self-learning and communicating AI agents in a neural network. These agents completely take over the work of the software.
AnalyticsSection.paragraph5: Redundancies, inconsistencies, errors, (impending) cost overruns or other deviations are identified, data consolidated and then aggregated at the desired level of detail in the EAS Cockpit.
AnalyticsSection.paragraph6: This cross-functional transparency creates the foundation to permanently monitor and manage your business. It directly impacts your resource allocation and the future performance development of the company.
AnalyticsSection.paragraph7: In addition, our software provides the ability to gain deeper insights into the current status of all ongoing interdisciplinary processes of a development project (e.g., sourcing statuses, maturity levels, current risk assessments, financial evaluations and much more).

block1.paragraph1: Enterprise Analytics Software GmbH develops, adapts and operates fully autonomous and automated analysis, monitoring and management software solutions for companies, consortiums, large-scale projects, authorities, public institutions and other organizations.
block1.paragraph2: EAS neuronal® builds a virtual network of specialized EAS-AI-Agents® and is more than just a simple application of artificial intelligence. It is a team of virtual digitization experts working seamlessly together to independently perform complex analyses and solve problems.
block1.paragraph3: The AI agents fully scan all systems, databases and information sources of your company and beyond your organization, gathering all relevant information.

block2.paragraph1: With the help of these self-learning virtual agents, which are interconnected in a neural network, communicate with each other and learn from one another, all data is analyzed, processed and evaluated in a virtual EAS Data Lake®. In doing so, inconsistencies, errors, corruptions and incomplete information are identified and highlighted.
block2.paragraph2: Each agent contributes its unique expertise, communicates in real time with others and optimizes decisions within milliseconds. From the moment they are introduced, these AI agents act as additional employees in your company, bringing order to your data landscape as countless invisible helpers and replacing all previous manual activities such as data collection, processing, aggregation, reconciliations and report generation.

block3.paragraph1: Whether it’s data analysis, process automation, multi-project management or creative idea development—you don’t just get an AI solution, but an intelligent ecosystem that grows with every task and learns on its own.
block3.paragraph2: Faster. Smarter. More efficient. Welcome to the future of artificial, connected intelligence.
block3.paragraph3: In addition, our software provides the ability to gain deeper insights into the current status of all ongoing interdisciplinary processes (e.g., sourcing statuses, existing maturity levels, current risk assessments, financial evaluations, currency risks, supplier ratings and much more). Feel free to contact us.

section1.subtitle: WHO WE ARE AS A COMPANY
section1.title: Complexity is increasing disproportionately and progressively in all areas
boxes: Market requirements (innovation, AI, political requirements, environment, sustainability)
Increasing product complexity and variety of variants with shorter product life and innovation cycles
More and more unpredictable and incalculable influencing factors with interdependencies in the value chain and stakeholder network
Constantly changing framework conditions
Estimation and anticipation of future series prices of procurement volumes becoming increasingly difficult

section2.subtitle: RESOURCE CONSUMPTION
section2.title: Resource consumption is increasing in all company areas, across the entire value chain and also in the stakeholder network
boxes: Volume of data, number of IT systems
Number and scope of organizational units – especially in the 'indirect areas' is steadily increasing
Administrative effort is rising disproportionately
Number of duplicates, redundancies and potential errors is noticeably increasing (e.g. standard component is managed with different article numbers in different systems)

section3.subtitle: BASIS FOR DECISION-MAKING
section3.title: Decisions in complex organizational units with many levels, processes and interfaces are made on the basis of incomplete, incorrect and sometimes contradictory information
boxes: “Objectified subjectivity” as a basis for product-related economic considerations
Decision times and coordination loops are becoming longer and more extensive
All possible alternatives are never fully evaluated and available as a basis for decision-making

section4.subtitle: IMPACT OF THE MENTIONED DEVELOPMENTS ON COMPANIES AND THEIR ORGANIZATION
boxes: Profit margins erode over time and cannot be maintained until the start of series production
Supply volumes (materials, components, assemblies, etc.) are not available on time for SOP / series production

No solution in the product development process (PLC) to display the current status of all product-related information at any time (e.g. material or component prices, margin, availability, schedule deviations, missing certifications, approvals, etc.)
Large number of systems, software, interface problems, access rights, non-continuous processes, data and information losses
section4.content: So far, there is no fully integrated and cross-process software solution that consolidates, aggregates, and presents all product-related information and ensures a secure and smooth flow of the required development processes, even though numerous crises, such as the 2009 financial crisis or Corona 2020, have shown that it would be urgently necessary to introduce and implement systematic safeguarding measures here.

section5.title: THE COMPANY
boxes: In 2024, Dr. Nicolae Tudor and Volker P. Zimmerer MBA decided on a joint collaboration to develop neural, AI-supported, integrative software analysis solutions based on the 'Big Data approach'.
An existing company is renamed Enterprise Analytics Software GmbH.
A&A Tudor Systems s.r.l. in Sibiu, Romania, is now operating as the joint development company Enterprise Analytics Software GmbH Romania s.r.l.
The German sales company has its offices – together with the consultancy Z management consulting of Volker P. Zimmerer – in the Stuttgart city center at the Collection Business Center.

section1.heading: CHAPTER : 1
section1.title: TECHNICAL SOLUTION APPROACH
section1.intro1: A) In today’s technological landscape, the use of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and neural networks is of central importance, as these are prerequisites for the contemporary elimination of organizational hurdles and interfaces.
lists1: Digital EAS-AI Agents® are deployed to solve different tasks (e.g., Project Agent, Purchasing Agent, Quality Agent, Duplicate Agent, etc.)
The agents are designed to work efficiently and precisely to achieve the desired results
The EAS-AI Agents® communicate independently and continuously with each other in the EAS Neural Network®
section1.intro2: B) The following tasks are to be implemented in the neural network:
lists2: Representation / comparison of different states from the past and their development over time
Maturity level indicators (e.g., 53% status of data maintenance, expected actual price vs. contract price or target price, etc.)

Accurate simulations for forecasts, scenarios, sensitivity analyses, and stress tests of changes in influencing factors of the product (such as currency trends, raw material price changes, inflation surcharges, etc.)
section1.description: EAS solutions, through the use of advanced algorithms and machine learning technologies, can recognize and predict complex interrelationships in order to optimally plan and control your company, business units, products, projects, assemblies, and components. This creates the basis for well-founded decisions based on objective real-time data of the actual state. Overall, the vision of AI agents acting cooperatively and intelligently to solve complex tasks demonstrates unforeseen and immeasurable potential. The symbiosis of AI, neural networks, and big data analysis is unique to EAS solutions.
section1.subdesc: A neural network is a model inspired by the human brain. It consists of layers of neurons that are interconnected. These layers process information and learn from the provided data. Mathematical operations and learning algorithms enable the network to identify and understand complex patterns and relationships within the data. Similar to ants in a colony, AI agents must communicate efficiently with each other. This can take place via digital signals, message transmission, or other mechanisms. Transparent information exchange between the agents is essential to optimize the overall performance of the system.
section1.intro3: C) EAS AI-AGENTS® communicate independently and continuously within the learning EAS NEURAL NETWORK® with each other:
lists3: Different states from the past and their development over time
Maturity level indicators (e.g., 53% status of data maintenance, expected actual price is currently 3.7% above target price, etc.)
Accurate simulations for forecasts, scenarios, sensitivity analyses, and stress tests of changes in influencing factors of the product (such as currency trends, raw material price changes)
section1.description1: EAS solutions, through the use of advanced algorithms and machine learning technologies, can recognize and predict complex interrelationships in order to optimally plan and control your projects and products. This, in turn, is the prerequisite for making well-founded decisions based on objective actual data. Overall, the vision of AI agents acting cooperatively and intelligently to solve complex tasks demonstrates great potential.

section2.heading: CHAPTER : 2
section2.title: USER INTERFACE AND DASHBOARD
section2.description1: The dashboard offers two levels of analysis:
section2.listDes1: At the business level, the dashboard enables a comprehensive assessment of the overall corporate situation by consolidating and aggregating all relevant data from individual parts, assemblies, products per business unit, segment, and division. Organizational units that are not functioning optimally or sufficiently can be specifically identified. Here, the software allows visualization of all conceivable levels of the company.
section2.listDes2: At the process level, the EAS-Cockpit software enables a detailed analysis down to the individual process level and can identify procedural deficiencies. Both perspectives of analysis provide top management with the prerequisites to quickly identify weaknesses and eliminate them in a targeted manner.

section3.heading: CHAPTER : 3
section3.title: DEVELOPMENT OF EAS SOFTWARE AND DASHBOARD
section3.description:
Manufacturers increasingly face the necessity of ensuring the profit margin of their product portfolio. Various analyses clearly demonstrate that the materials and preliminary products intended for the (new) product are subject to unpredictable influences and risks that often affect the economic outcome before the product even enters series production.

EAS views the product and service spectrum and the company’s portfolio as the most fundamental business factor and therefore focuses exclusively on this perspective.
section3.strong: The economic crises and phases of severe downturns (2009, 2012, 2019, and 2020) have burdened the corporate landscape existentially at ever shorter intervals. Many product portfolios are no longer economically viable and therefore no longer safeguard the company’s existence.

boxes.title: Lack of product / project reference of individual components
boxes.desc: Existing solutions only map the individual component level; the reference to the product is missing.

boxes.title: Only isolated solutions for individual process steps (e.g., purchasing)
boxes.desc: The software used only provides solutions for individual process steps of the multi-stage project purchasing process, which makes comprehensive digitization and quick reactions in critical phases difficult.

boxes.title: Data leaves the company
boxes.desc: Highly sensitive purchasing data must be transmitted by the user to service providers, often on cloud-based servers (China).
